content: This one contains a handful of trivial lemmas about star. Would someone mind taking a look, so that I can follow up with the star-monoid structure on units R that needs one of the lemmas there?
Is the debate that Heather mentioned resolved https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/9651#issuecomment-939587524 ?

Oliver Nash said:

Is the debate that Heather mentioned resolved https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/9651#issuecomment-939587524 ?

I think the current plan is to stick with star_ring_aut as the standard form for the complex conjugate, but I don't think it would be too hard to switch to unbundled star in the future if we decide to do it.
Thanks! Added the follow-up in #9681, and a spin-off in #9661
